xwikidoc.name: SolrTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Solr Search Translations
xwikidoc.content:
### Missing: solr.admin.title=Solr Search Administration ### Missing: solr.admin.submit=Apply ### Missing: solr.admin.error.notallowed=You are not allowed to perform this action. ### Missing: solr.admin.error.norights=Administration rights are required to access this section.
solr.admin.status.title=Estado ### Missing: solr.admin.status.queueSize.label=Queue size ### Missing: solr.admin.status.queueSize.hint=The number of entities that are left to be indexed, re-indexed or deleted from the index (depending on the executed action).
### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.title=Indexing solr.admin.indexing.action.label=Acción ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.action.hint=The action to perform on the index. ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.action.select_index=Add to index ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.action.select_delete=Delete from index ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.action.select_reindex=Reindex ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.wiki.label=Wiki ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.wiki.hint=The wiki for which all its documents will be affected by the selected action. ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.wiki.select_farm=Entire farm ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.query.label=Custom query ### Missing: solr.admin.indexing.query.hint=Optional query to limit the documents that will be affected by the selected action in the index.
solr.sortBy=Ordenar por\: solr.sortBy.score=Relevancia solr.sortBy.title_sort=Título solr.sortBy.date=Fecha solr.sortBy.author_display_sort=Último Autor ### Missing: solr.sortBy.filename_sort=File name ### Missing: solr.sortBy.attsize_sort=File size ### Missing: solr.sortBy.attdate_sort=Upload date ### Missing: solr.sortBy.attauthor_display_sort=Uploaded by ### Missing: solr.sortOrder.asc=Ascending ### Missing: solr.sortOrder.desc=Descending
### Missing: solr.options=Show: ### Missing: solr.options.highlight=Highlighting ### Missing: solr.options.highlight.title=Display en extract of what was matched in each result ### Missing: solr.options.facet=Facets ### Missing: solr.options.facet.title=Allow extra filtering of the result
